GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v6.0.16
GSD.description:
serial: amba-pl011: avoid SBSA UART accessing DMACR register

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.16 by commit 38a10fdd54d17590d45cb1c43b9889da383b6b1a, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit 0dd1e247fd39aed20fd2baacc62ca44d82534798. For more details please see the references link.
